attributes.action: reform MP's final pension salary schemes as they have done to other workers.
attributes.additional_details: I want the Government to show that they are not the  Elite and prove it by amending their own Final Salary Pension scheme the same as they have done for many thousands of British workers and are currently doing  with the  Nuclear Industry. I want them to  show the public that MP's are not above the law and are willing to take the same loss of pension payments when they retire, the Government has  taken millions of pounds already earned by  workers, yet still  maintain their own Final salary one.
attributes.background: The Government has systematically taken money from the  pensions of final salary pension schemes for the last few years.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses, pay and pensions. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://parliamentarystandards.org.uk/About%20Us/Pages/Contact-Us.aspx
